name: Is It Haunted?
description:
This is a sequel to my other short game, Haunted House and contains spoiler from that story. You don't  need to play that game in order to understand  this one.

The game has 6 possible  endings. Please replay instead of using check point if you can't  get more ending, because  variable from previous play affect checkpoint replay.

Synopsis:

John, your occult loving friend, bribed you to explore another house that's  rumored to be haunted. Per John's research,  this house had been truly abandoned  for more than 20 years. What trouble is awaiting you in the house?

This short game was created in two weeks using the Spinoff app  for the Mini Interactive Story Jam #2.5. Play and rate would be much appreciated 

Credit:

- Story and art: Saitoki

-Music: Dark dream,Kiddy reggae, Bubble gum from Spinoff App
